items.sentence: The vase fell on to the stone floor and smashed into a thousand pieces.
Tom asked me why I thought learning French would be useful for his job.
I think Tom believes what he's saying is true, but I don't think it is.
You're wearing the same clothes you were wearing yesterday, aren't you?
Tom can't swim at all. On the other hand, he is a good baseball player.
Tom realized that he barely had enough time to do what he wanted to do.
Tom got there early to make sure that everything had been set up right.
You should assume we won't have enough money to buy everything we want.
Tom was happy when he got his final exam back and saw that he'd passed.
From how you described this place, I was expecting something different.
